attributes.action: bestow a knighthood upon Timo Glock for services to British Motor Racing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British public firmly believe that the Formula 1 Driver Timo Glock is deserving on this honour of a knighthood as it was his mistake that allowed Lewis Hamilton to win the 2008 F1 Drivers World Championship

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
